New Records: Liam Livingstone scored his first ODI century.
England achieved the second-highest successful ODI chase in the West Indies.
Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone scored 124 not out from 85 deliveries.
Sam Curran contributed with a run-a-ball 52.
John Turner dismissed Brandon King and Evin Lewis early, reducing West Indies to 12-2.
Shai Hope scored 117 to lead West Indies to 328-6.
Keacy Carty scored 71 and partnered with Hope for a 143-run stand.
Matthew Forde hit three consecutive sixes in his 11-ball 23.
Post-Match Reflections: Liam Livingstone expressed pride in his performance and mentioned his improvement in practice.
Livingstone noted his enjoyment of cricket and maturity in his game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England used nine bowlers but was hampered by dropped catches.
Jofra Archer was England's best bowler with 1-40 from nine overs.
